snippet.title: Deca Sports 3 (Wii) Trailer
snippet.description: Nintendo Life - The new teaser trailer for the third iteration in Hudson's sports collection franchise, featuring Wii MotionPlus support and online play. This will include the following sports, with online play available for those with * next to them:  indoor volleyball*, giant slalom, racquetball*, air racing, kayaking, lacrosse*, logging, halfpipe and fencing*. www.nintendolife.com
